jeksterslabRlib 0.9.0

Generate Spinger Links from DOI.

Source: R/lib_springer_link.R
lib_springer_link.Rd

Generate Spinger Links from DOI.

lib_springer_link(doi = "10.1007/978-0-387-79054-1", PDF = TRUE)

Arguments

doi

Character vector. A vector of Digital Object Identifiers.
PDF

Logical. If TRUE, returns links for PDF files. If FALSE, returns links for EPUB files.

Examples

# Single DOI
doi <- "10.1007/978-0-387-98141-3"
lib_springer_link(
  doi = doi,
  PDF = TRUE
)
#> [1] "https://link.springer.com/content/pdf/10.1007/978-0-387-98141-3.pdf"
lib_springer_link(
  doi = doi,
  PDF = FALSE
)
#> [1] "https://link.springer.com/download/epub/10.1007/978-0-387-98141-3.epub"
# Vector of DOIs
doi <- c(
  "https://doi.org/10.1007/978-0-387-71762-3",
  "10.1007/978-0-387-98141-3"
)
lib_springer_link(
  doi = doi,
  PDF = TRUE
)
#> [1] "https://link.springer.com/content/pdf/10.1007/978-0-387-71762-3.pdf"
#> [2] "https://link.springer.com/content/pdf/10.1007/978-0-387-98141-3.pdf"
lib_springer_link(
  doi = doi,
  PDF = FALSE
)
#> [1] "https://link.springer.com/download/epub/10.1007/978-0-387-71762-3.epub"
#> [2] "https://link.springer.com/download/epub/10.1007/978-0-387-98141-3.epub"
